### Tender Announcement
# RFP SUPPLY AND INSTALLATION OF VEHICLE ACCESSORIES
## Solicitation Number: WS4339843329
## Publication Date: December 21, 2023

### Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking offers to supply and install vehicle accessories for twelve (12) 2022 Chevrolet Express vehicles, to the Department of National Defence (DND), Real Property Operations Unit (RPOU), no later than June 30, 2024.

### Key Details
- **Closing Date:** January 15, 2024, 14:00 EST
- **Solicitation Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
- **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

### Contact Information
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
  - Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
  - Contact: Fernandez, Allison (elle-la / she-her) at allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tenders and Request for Proposals

Tenders for the RFP SUPPLY AND INSTALLATION OF VEHICLE ACCESSORIES must be submitted electronically through the CanadaBuys platform or the Ariba Discovery website. All bids must be received by January 15, 2024, at 14:00 EST.

Late bids will be declared non-responsive. It is the responsibility of the Offeror to ensure that their bid is submitted on time. Bidders who encounter technical difficulties should contact the contact listed above for assistance.

Only the successful bidder(s) will be notified and invited to negotiate a contract. The Contracting Authority reserves the right to accept or reject any or all tenders, or to cancel the bidding process at its discretion.

The terms and conditions of the government procurement process can be found on the Government of Canada’s website.

### Topics and Selection Criteria

This tender involves the following topics and selection criteria:
- Topic: Supply and Installation of Vehicle Accessories
- Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Duration and End Date

The expected contract duration is from March 4, 2024, to April 1, 2024.
